verbs.description: [ARG0: soundhound inc] [V: adds] [ARG1: soundhound music recognition technology] [ARGM-PRP: to houndify voice ai platform santa clara calif business wire -oct 31 2018-soundhound inc ® the leading innovator in voice - enabled ai and conversational intelligence technologies] today announced the addition of its award - winning soundhound music recognition technology to its houndify tm voice ai platform launching today the soundhound music recognition feature is now available via request allowing brands and developers to license the music search technology for use within their software interfaces or to access via voice queries this expands houndify ai - based platform and uniquely offers proprietary music recognition technology that searches across one of the world largest music databases select partners that have already deployed soundhound music recognition into their products include hyundai motorola htc samsung korea telecom and casio g - shock watch soundhound inc htc apple ai santa clara california houndify vauxhall soundhound tencent holdings limited soundhound inc technology opel santa clara orange s a spotify korea telecom houndify voice ai platform co - founder and vp of products developer calif james hom hyundai casio onkyo peugeot midea group motorola daimler ag samsung hyundai motor company nvidia

soundhound inc adds soundhound music recognition technology to houndify voice [V: ai] platform santa clara calif business wire -oct 31 2018-soundhound inc ® the leading innovator in voice - enabled ai and conversational intelligence technologies today announced the addition of its award - winning soundhound music recognition technology to its houndify tm voice ai platform launching today the soundhound music recognition feature is now available via request allowing brands and developers to license the music search technology for use within their software interfaces or to access via voice queries this expands houndify ai - based platform and uniquely offers proprietary music recognition technology that searches across one of the world largest music databases select partners that have already deployed soundhound music recognition into their products include hyundai motorola htc samsung korea telecom and casio g - shock watch soundhound inc htc apple ai santa clara california houndify vauxhall soundhound tencent holdings limited soundhound inc technology opel santa clara orange s a spotify korea telecom houndify voice ai platform co - founder and vp of products developer calif james hom hyundai casio onkyo peugeot midea group motorola daimler ag samsung hyundai motor company nvidia

soundhound inc adds soundhound music recognition technology to houndify voice ai platform santa clara calif business wire -oct 31 2018-soundhound inc ® the [V: leading] [ARG0: innovator] in voice - enabled ai and conversational intelligence technologies today announced the addition of its award - winning soundhound music recognition technology to its houndify tm voice ai platform launching today the soundhound music recognition feature is now available via request allowing brands and developers to license the music search technology for use within their software interfaces or to access via voice queries this expands houndify ai - based platform and uniquely offers proprietary music recognition technology that searches across one of the world largest music databases select partners that have already deployed soundhound music recognition into their products include hyundai motorola htc samsung korea telecom and casio g - shock watch soundhound inc htc apple ai santa clara california houndify vauxhall soundhound tencent holdings limited soundhound inc technology opel santa clara orange s a spotify korea telecom houndify voice ai platform co - founder and vp of products developer calif james hom hyundai casio onkyo peugeot midea group motorola daimler ag samsung hyundai motor company nvidia
